item.title: How Sequoia-backed Ethos reached the public market while rivals fell short
item.description: The profitable life-insurance platform was one of the first major tech companies to test the 2026 public markets.

item.title: The iPhone just had its best quarter ever
item.description: Growth in regions like China and India are credited with pushing Apple's phone sales higher than ever.

item.title: Guys, I don’t think Tim Cook knows how to monetize AI
item.description: One intrepid Morgan Stanley analyst dared to ask how Apple will make money on its AI investments. The answer will not shock you.

item.title: Elon Musk’s SpaceX, Tesla, and xAI in talks to merge, according to reports
item.description: This merger would bring the Grok chatbot, Starlink satellites, and SpaceX rockets together under one corporation.

item.title: Amazon is reportedly in talks to invest $50B in OpenAI
item.description: If a deal materializes, it would mean Amazon is backing competing startups in the race for AI supremacy.
